title: Fluorescent, phosphorescent, magnetic resonance contrast and radioactive tracer labelling of extracellular vesicles
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D2CS00238H, Review Article
Kartika Wardhani, Aviva Levina, Georges E. R. Grau, Peter A. Lay
This review focusses on the significance of fluorescent, phosphorescent labelling and tracking of extracellular vesicles (EVs) for unravelling their biology, pathophysiology, and potential diagnostic and therapeutic uses.
